elements.name: question2
elements.title: Why always plan everything, said Nadine. Things usually turn out differently than you think.

elements.name: question1
elements.title: He asked me whether I would accept the position in Lugano.
elements.correctAnswer: He asked me whether I would accept the position in Lugano.

elements.name: question3
elements.title: Attention, attention, it sounded from the loudspeaker. This is the police.

elements.name: question4
elements.title: One of his favorite words is suboptimal.
elements.correctAnswer: One of his favorite words is "suboptimal".

elements.name: question5
elements.title: The teacher asked us Did you write down the date for the exam and announced the exam topics.
elements.correctAnswer: The teacher asked us: "Have you noted the date for the exam?" and announced the exam topics.

elements.name: panel1
elements.title: Insert: Quotation mark, colon, exclamation mark, question mark.

elements.name: question6
elements.title: Stay calm, she thought to herself at the sight of the aggressively barking dog.

elements.name: question7
elements.title: The report literally states that your social skills leave a lot to be desired.
elements.correctAnswer: The report states verbatim: "Your social skills leave a lot to be desired."

elements.name: question8
elements.title: Will the last really be the first?

elements.name: question9
elements.title: Her problem is that she keeps saying she doesn't have a problem.
elements.correctAnswer: Her "problem" is that she constantly says she doesn't have a problem.

elements.name: question10
elements.title: The excursion, which was advertised as a walk, was more like a mountain hike.
elements.correctAnswer: The excursion, which was advertised as a "walk", was more like a mountain hike.
